729127f-a.text:
107 Narion Avenue (0cean Terrace), south of the S. E. corner of Occident Avenue. Shown is the rear of the house owned by John Detiens (1917 map), as seen from the corner of
Trossach Road and St. Pauls Avenue.
July 8, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729127f-a.folder: Marion Avenue & Occident Avenue, Staten Island, NY
